channel.title: How do i play a server i downloaded?
channel.description: i downloaded a server but i dont know how to play it [hr] please help...thanks

item.title: How do i play a server i downloaded?
item.dc:creator: @purelion6679 purelion6679
item.description:
@purelion6679 wrote:

a small suggestion…look inside the tutorial section of these forums and one of the stickys will have a great tutorial on how to start your own private server…small questions like these have been answered countlessly and are getting rather annoying, so please look at tutorials first before posting a silly question such as this.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i play a server i downloaded?
item.dc:creator: @Uniqaz Uniqaz
item.description:
@Uniqaz wrote:

well thats good, now u connect to ur server… open the client and in ip type localhost or 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 and wallah u can play
